channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taking out a loan? First make these 5 smart moves to raise your credit score — whether you have weeks or months
item.description: MarketWatch talked to credit experts to develop an order of operations to improve your credit score ASAP and get better loan rates in 2026

item.title: The U.S. services sector picked up in December, as employment expanded for first time in seven months
item.description: Economists see the services sector continuing to expand moderately as long as consumer spending holds up.

item.title: ‘Women deserve an apology’: For menopause, hormone therapy is now considered safe — just in time for aging millennials
item.description: The FDA no longer requires a safety warning on hormone-replacement therapies, at a time when more attention is being paid to perimenopause and menopau...

item.title: Investors are waiting on Friday’s jobs numbers. They should be more worried about this productivity report.
item.description: AI-driven productivity gains are hindering the Fed’s effort to juice the labor market.

item.title: U.S. economy is barely adding new workers. Job openings stay stuck near 5-year low.
item.description: Almost as many jobs are destroyed as are created

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
